name: Touhou: TwinRhythm
description:
Touhou TwinRhythm: DJ’s Party in Outer Space

Note-Hitting, Note-Dodging Rhythm Action!

On a cool summer night, something strange happens. Through a clerical error on behalf of the Dream World, Kaguya and Mamizou are somehow sharing the same dream! Looks like they’re going to make the most of it, though -- it’s a cosmic disco party, and they’re going to dance the night away!

Use the arrow keys to hit the button prompts in time to some seriously funky beats -- while simultaneously using the A and D keys to dodge those prompts as one of two playable characters! Build up a huge note combo and go for a high score!

Features:
-3 Remixes of Touhou Tracks to play through composed by WookyWok!
-Saveable High Scores to share with your friends!
-Beautiful Game-Art by DJThunderHeart!

IMPORTANT:
-Keep the Save File in the same directory as your game after it's created.

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Get Notes
W and A: Move the character left and right respectively
Mouse: Navigate the Menus
Q: Quit the Application at any time.
R: On the Hi-Score Screen, use the "R" key to reset high scores.

Touhou Project is owned by Team Shanghai Alice.
